name: Micha Kops / hasCode.com
body:
I am a software engineer currently employed in Wiesbaden/Germany and I am sharing some of my more or less valuable insights on the internet e.g. in my blog by posting code/snippets, reviews and tutorials. If youâ€™re interested, please take a look at other resources of mine on the web:

* [Blog] - Tutorials, snippets, sample code and articles of mine.
* [Bitbucket] - My project and tutorial sources.
* [Twitter] - Tweets and stuff ..
* [YouTube] - Videos from my tutorials.
* [Scrum Alliance] - My profile in the Scrum Alliance Community.
* [Atlassian Marketplace] - My plugins published on the Atlassian Marketplace.
* [Google Profile] - My Google+ profile.
* [Slideshare] - Presentations..
* [XING] - My XING profile.


   [Blog]:http://www.hascode.com
   [Bitbucket]:http://bitbucket.org/hascode
   [Twitter]:http://twitter.com/hascode
   [YouTube]:http://www.youtube.com/user/hascodedotcom
   [Scrum Alliance]:http://www.scrumalliance.org/profiles/135626-micha-kops
   [Atlassian Marketplace]:https://plugins.atlassian.com/vendors/22595
   [Google Profile]:https://plus.google.com/101312240852175091441/
   [Slideshare]:http://www.slideshare.net/hascode
   [XING]:https://www.xing.com/profile/Micha_Kops
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
